## Goals
- Refresh tidyverse data wrangling, ggplot2, writing small functions, set.seed, Quarto basics.
- Mini-module: **AI-with-R** (prompting patterns; verifying outputs with diagnostics).

> **AI Assist:** Ask an AI to *explain an error message* and propose a minimal reproducible example. **Verify** by running the code and checking outputs.

```{{r}}
# Example: load tidyverse and inspect a dataset
library(tidyverse)
set.seed(42)
df <- tibble(site = rep(letters[1:10], each=20),
             depth = runif(200, 5, 80),
             temp = rnorm(200, 12, 2),
             count = rpois(200, lambda = exp(0.02*(20-depth))))
glimpse(df)
```
